eu_initiatives:
Transportation 
Passenger systems 
Cargo systems 
 
Hyperloop One is not currently following any specific EU initiatives, policies, or legislative files. We are registering with the EU Transparency Register to continue meeting with European Union policy makers to introduce them to Hyperloop One as the world's newest form of transportation. We will update our Transparency Register if and when Hyperloop one starts following specific initiatives, policies, and/or legislative files.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Our goal is to make Hyperloop transportation a reality. Hyperloop would be an energy-elegant, safe, and rapid transportation system.
relevant_communication: We are in ongoing discussions with the transport ministries and research ministries of a number of member states, as well as DG Move, regarding transport projects and funding.
